entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 13 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
